Ydrassil:

Ydrassil arrived to base and followed Organics "Will you be alright?"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Organics:
>  
> Organics nodded and then lifted into the air.  She then flew back 
to the base, where she went into the mess hall, found a chair, 
propped up her feet, and went to sleep.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Ydrassil:::
> 
> "Then lets go... you need rest"said Kindly the male
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Organics:
> >  
> > The valkyrie looked up to Ydrassil, and sigh.
> > "No... Yes.  Everything is fine.  He said he will come back, and 
> he will.  I just, have a hard time dealing with the fact I can't 
see 
> or talk to him now, we have only just found each other again after 
> three hundred years, but I'll manage.  He'll be back."
> > She drops the disruptor to her side, takes a deep breath, and is 
> ready to go.
> >

> >

> >

> >

<bustercross365@y...>

> > >  
> > > "Alright then."

She 
> > looked around a while longer and found her Chaos Breaker where 
> > Malice dropped it.  Picking the huge weapon up and giving it a 
> > twirl, she put it on hr back where it was held by some clamps.  
> She 
> > looked at the rifle Malice had left behind, and for a moment, 
> looked 
> > forlorn and sad.  She held the rifle close to her chest, as if 
it 
> > were someone dear.
> > > "Oh Malice.  Please come back soon."
